輝きの盟約は損傷していたため、ブローニャはむき出しになったケーブルを宇宙服に接続した。
빛나는 서약이 손상되어 브로냐는 드러난 케이블을 우주복에 연결했다.
There were tears on the Glorious Covenant, so Bronya attached the exposed wiring to her spacesuit.
There were tears on the Brilliant Covenant, so Bronya attached the exposed wiring to the spacesuit.
The Pact of Brilliance was damaged, so Bronya connected the exposed cables to the spacesuit.
msg
被攻陷的天命浮空岛有辉煌盟约号的图纸，所以她们出发前，博士给每件宇航服都准备了计算芯片和破解程序。
陥落した天命の浮遊島に輝きの盟約の図面があったので、出発前、博士が演算チップとロック解除プログラムを全員の宇宙服に仕込んでおいたのだ。
함락된 천명의 부유섬에 빛나는 서약의 설계도가 있었기 때문에, 출발 전 박사가 연산 칩과 잠금 해제 프로그램을 모두의 우주복에 장착해 두었던 것이다.
The captured Schicksal Floating Islands had sketches of the Glorious Covenant, so before they left, the Doctor prepared a computer chip with a cracking program for each spacesuit.
The captured Heavenly Destiny floating island had the drawings of the Brilliant Covenant, so before they left, the Doctor prepared a computing chip and a cracking program for each spacesuit.

The drawings of the Pact of Brilliance were found on the fallen floating island of Heavenly Life, so before departure, the doctor had planted a computing chip and unlocking program in everyone's space suits.
msg
理论上，布洛妮娅、希儿和杏中的任何一人，将宇航服接入辉煌盟约号，都可以获得它的控制权。
理論上、ブローニャ、ゼーレ、シンの誰でも、宇宙服を輝きの盟約に接続すれば、輝きの盟約の管理権限を獲得できる。
이론상 브로냐, 제레, 신 중 누구든 우주복을 빛나는 서약에 연결하면, 빛나는 서약의 관리 권한을 획득할 수 있다.
Theoretically, Bronya, Seele or Sin, any who plugged in their spacesuits in the Glorious Covenant, could gain control of it.
Theoretically, any of Bronya, Hill and Apricot, who plugged the spacesuit into the Brilliant Covenant, could gain control of it.
In theory, any one of Bronya, Seele, or Singh could gain control of the Pact of Brilliance by connecting their space suits to the Pact of Brilliance.
